Text: ps. this is made by me

No sound in the game, launch this error when start it: "Microsoft Xaudio2: CPU does not meet minimum requeriment; Streaming SIMD Extensions support required."

New iMac 21,5" end of 2012.
Nvidia gt640m 
Ram 8gb ddr3
i5 2.7 GHz
OS X 10.8.4

Hey! 

I have a 10.8.4 and it doesn't work well. 

It starts and all, but there's a glitch in the texture that makes the game unplayable...

Any solution? 

thanks!

@albert358 since you have nvidia, you should install phys  x on the port. you can do this by 

app-> package contents-> click wineskin.app -> advanced -> 2nd tab -> winetricks -> search "phys x" -> check the box -> click run -> when dialog box comes up (do you wish to run ...) click ok -> wait -> when done, launch again
@failzone Thanks for the help, but the error isn't clear. I was install Phys X and launch the game then but i haven't got sound....

@failzone   Thanks for the game ! I'm having the same audio problem, I did what you say but the problem it's still remaining...


Macbook Pro Retina, mid-2012
OSX 10.8.4
2,3 GHz i7
Nvidia GeForce GT650M

I have the texture problem, as with the other 2K13, I can't set the benchmark to change the video settings.

OSX 10.8.4
Quad-Core Intel Xeon
2.4 GHz
ATI Radeon HD 5770

Any ideas?
you do not have to benchmark, although the settings might be gray, you can still change them
it may not work on ati video cards

if you have graphic problems, try turning off dedicated video cards and play with only integrated video such as intel hd 4000 as it works the best in intel hd drivers. 
try http://gfx.io/
